name: divcan3d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1))

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))

comment: A cancellation law for division. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
